Understanding Fraud

Fraud is a serious crime that can affect anyone. It is essential to be aware of the different types of fraud and how to protect yourself.

Types of Fraud:

  • Phishing: Fraudulent attempts to obtain sensitive information.
  • Identity Theft: Stealing personal information to impersonate someone.
  • Online Scams: Fraudulent schemes conducted online.
  • Investment Fraud: Deceptive investment opportunities.

How to Protect Yourself:

  • Always verify the source of emails and messages.
  • Use strong, unique passwords for different accounts.
  • Monitor your financial statements regularly.
  • Be cautious of unsolicited offers and requests for personal information.
